originalText.text: I came in today for a color correction and the entire staff was so polite and friendly. Matilda and Tiffany were a godsend right in time for the holidays. Thank you all so much for turning a disaster into a blessing. My hair looks beautiful now and I won‚Äôt need to wear a hat for holiday pictures. I highly recommend this salon and will be returning as a regular! ‚ô•Ô∏èüôè‚ô•Ô∏è

originalText.text: The salon is  very welcoming and I look forward to going back. I keep getting compliments about my hair since I went!

text.text: The salon is  very welcoming and I look forward to going back. I keep getting compliments about my hair since I went!

originalText.text: I tried this salon using a Groupon. Boy, am I glad! I usually detest the salon environment because of pretentious attitudes, loudness, and fake impersonal service. It's already going to be very time-consuming and expensive, so who needs this? Every staff member was so personable and respectful. It was a calm and quicker experience than in the past. My highlights and cut were on point. Mirna Franco saw to it. She was a breath of fresh air. I'm going to budget in order to add this to my life.

text.text: I tried this salon using a Groupon. Boy, am I glad! I usually detest the salon environment because of pretentious attitudes, loudness, and fake impersonal service. My highlights and cut were on point. Mirna Franco saw to it. She was a breath of fresh air. I'm going to budget in order to add this to my life.

originalText.text: Horrible experience. DO NOT use this salon.  I went for a Magic Sleek treatment and I got the treatment as well as the shampoo and conditioner to use later. My hair was frizzy right after the very first shampoo and when I went back to Aaron, he refused to accept that it was frizz and kept calling them waves. I asked for a refund, he refused, he told me he could do a keratin or give me a color credit neither of which I wanted to get done at this salon since their products are obviously ineffective. I don‚Äôt even color my hair on a regular basis and he kept insisting on a color credit, calling himself a ‚Äúhair doctor‚Äù. The owner Aaron who did my treatment was rude and dismissive. $350 completely wasted. I have got a keratin treatment done for the past 10 years and have been very satisfied. This treatment was a total scam made truly worse by Aaron‚Äôs rude behavior.

This treatment was a total scam made truly worse by Aaron‚Äôs rude behavior.

originalText.text:
i had gone yesterday for a conditioning treatment and blow dry and ..while I was being shampooed in the sink, i overheard a very callous remark by nora about my cologne- she was telling ana who was doing my hair to 'hurry up and finish with this guy becuase he stinks ' .. she went straight for the door and opened it widely ajar. I had a dinner reservation last night with associates and it was formal affair.  my fragrance is $200 a bottle . I get complemented on it all the time but nora was extremely rude wIth her asinine comment .I was APPALLLED at what she said . her facial demeanor was very mean and lll leave it at that  . I asked her point blank ' what did you say to me '?? she pretended not to hear but she heard me very well. I even confronted her about it at the end of my session and she acted like she didnt know what I was talking about but her facial demeanor gave it all away
I wana say one last thing .when I walked in to abide by my stipulated appointment the one who I had the session with ana - I saw from the mirror reflection that she wasnt too keen on serving me. she spoke in a very hushed tone with the girl at the front desk - it's as if she didnt want to serve me. Even at the sink session she was trying to defend noras comment but pretending that the comment she made was about the conditioner . Pleaseee dont insult my intelligence .I am always nice and respectful with everyone but I see now that aaron emmanuel salon doesnt appreciate their clients.  I have an armada of friends colleagues and next of kin I would have loved to refer to your salon as clientele.  I wouldnt want to send them somewhere where they arent appreciated.
